revised_title: The Impregnation of Female Plants by Male Flowers
tldr: The author discusses the process of impregnating female plants by male flowers, using the example of the palma major foliis flabelliformibus tree. They explain how male and female flowers from different plants can be combined to produce fruit, and provide historical context for the understanding of plant reproduction. The author also highlights the importance of environmental factors in the success of plant reproduction.
